exercises.title: Ghana Flag Animation
exercises.description: Create an animated version of the Ghana flag
steps: Create a new project in Scratch
Draw a red, gold, and green rectangle sprite
Add a black star to the center using the shape tools
Program the flag to wave using the 'glide' and 'change size' blocks
Add Ghana's national anthem as background music

exercises.title: Ghanaian Market Game
exercises.description: Build a simple game about shopping in a local market
steps: Create a market background with multiple stalls
Add sprite characters for the seller and buyer
Create fruit and vegetable sprites with prices
Program the buyer to collect items and calculate total cost
Add Ghanaian currency (cedi) as the payment system

exercises.title: Adinkra Symbols Matching
exercises.description: Create a memory game with traditional Adinkra symbols
steps: Create sprites for different Adinkra symbols
Program a grid layout for the memory game
Add flip animation when a card is clicked
Implement matching logic to check if two flipped cards match
Include information about what each Adinkra symbol means

exercises.title: Ghanaian Music Maker
exercises.description: Create an interactive drum and music program with traditional Ghanaian instruments
steps: Add sprites for drums (like the talking drum), xylophones, and other instruments
Record or import sound samples for each instrument
Program each instrument to play when clicked
Create a rhythm sequencer that can play patterns
Add a background showing traditional Ghanaian musicians

exercises.title: Ghana Quiz Game
exercises.description: Build an educational quiz about Ghanaian history, culture, and geography
steps: Create a question bank with multiple-choice questions about Ghana
Design a user interface with question text and answer buttons
Program scoring logic to track correct answers
Add feedback for correct and incorrect answers
Include interesting facts about Ghana for each question

exercises.title: Ghanaian Foods Adventure
exercises.description: Create a game where players learn to cook traditional Ghanaian dishes
steps: Design a kitchen background with cooking utensils
Create sprites for various ingredients (yam, plantain, tomatoes, etc.)
Program a step-by-step cooking process for dishes like jollof rice or fufu
Add interactive elements where players select and combine ingredients
Include cultural information about each dish and its significance
